entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 800 metres. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. Becoming clear before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 2 April 2023
